original_text: After saying these things, Jesus was troubled in his spirit, and testified, “Truly, truly, I say to you, one of you will betray me.”
korean_text: 예수께서 이 말씀을 하시고 심령이 괴로워 증언하여 이르시되 내가 진실로 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 너희 중 하나가 나를 팔리라 하시니

sentences.original_text: Jesus was troubled in his spirit,
one of you will betray me.”
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 한 사람이 나를 배반하리라.”
